expectations: An authentic, high value experience for attendees and sponsors focused on the creative JavaScript and web ecosystem.

The priority for CityJS and HalfStack is the attendee experience, with great food, drinks, talks, swag, and community. HalfStack and CityJS are coming to Belgrade for the first time. HalfStack is a creative single track event hosted in a relaxed environment.

HalfStack and CityJS carefully curates talks that inspire and inform the audience in a highly interactive and entertaining manner. An intimate feeling where each attendee has time to meet one another; maximum capacity for HalfStack Belgrade is 125 attendees.
Organizations are invited to help our event through sponsorship. Choose from our sponsor levels or propose your own.
